title: Textile, 18th–19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, cotton, metallic foil
Technique: satin weave
description: Coarse white satin with design in silver foil of horizontal-vertical continuous repeat of pointed-arm crosses in a continuous interlaced framework. Eight-pointed stars, formed by interstices, are decorated with tracery.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 18th–19th century.Medium: silk, cotton, metallic foil
Technique: satin weave. 1952-171-1-b.
